name: Save Zombie
description: Save Zombie is the new escape game from ajazgames. Here let's play a new level of game , you are gonna to save this zombie, there are number combinations, clues , puzzles, memory move , some objects has to be tried randomly to unlock the clue or solve the puzzle.I am sure you will have freaky fun playing saving zombies. Good luck , hope you are safe.. fun playing new point and click games.
